item.title: Who is Francesco Tisiot?
item.description: Francesco Tisiot Ciao! I’m Francesco Tisiot, Staff Developer Advocate at Aiven. You can find me on twitter at @ftisiot and on LinkedIn Some more resources: My series of blog post for Aiven The slides of my previous speaking engagements on SpeakerDeck My previous company (Rittman Mead) related articles in Rittman Mead’s blog This is my personal blog! Stay tuned for ideas, tests and opinions related to my work. All the content written here is my own and don’t necessary reflect my company vision.
